pages.text: Humanoid creature infected with an unknown virus. Enhanced senses and mindless desire for fresh flesh. $(br2)1. Hightened Senses $(br)Highly elevated senses of smell, vision, and hearing make remaining hidden from a zombie nearly an impossible task. Often drawn to bright lights, loud sounds and the smell of

2. Horde Mentality $(br)Zombies are keenly aware of the actions of other zombies in the area and are prone to mobbing and investigating stimuli discovered by other zombies. $(br2)3. Cellular Degeneration $(br)Muscular deterioration renders zombies extremely slow, and due to a curious componund generated by infected cells, combustible in direct solar radiation.
Assessment: Avoid direct contact; unknown how the disease is transmitted or if it is transmissable at all.
